arts.sum: Reports in Germany claim that TSG Hoffenheim are in advanced negotiations to sign Bologna defender...

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim's Hlozek scores late to end Frankfurt’s winning run in 1st game since Marmoush left
arts.sum: Adam Hlozek scored in stoppage time for Hoffenheim to end Eintracht Frankfurt’s winning run with a 2-2 draw in the Bundesliga on Sunday. Ekitiké sent the goalkeeper the wrong way as he scored for the fourth consecutive game across all competitions.

arts.ttl: Late Hložek goal sees Hoffenheim draw with Frankfurt
arts.sum: Adam Hložek rescued a point at home for TSG Hoffenheim during Bundesliga matchday nineteen, as his added time goal saw them draw with Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Hoffenheim vs. Frankfurt
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Hoffenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt signs French striker Elye Wahi until 2030
arts.sum: It is the third significant career move in two years for Wahi, who joined Lens from Montpellier in 2023 for a fee of 35 million euros ($38 million), turning down Premier League side Chelsea. Bundesliga club Eintracht Frankfurt has signed French striker Elye Wahi on a long-term deal until 2030.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Eagles look to maintain top-four form
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt travel to the PreZero Arena on Sunday afternoon, to face a Hoffenheim side scrapping for points at the bottom end of the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Exclusive | English and French clubs among those interested in signing Jean-Mattéo Bahoya
arts.sum: Several European clubs are interested in signing Eintracht Frankfurt attacker Jean-Mattéo Bahoya (19) on loan, according to sources contacted by Get German Football News. Clubs from England, Italy, Spain and…

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt welcome Elye Wahi, Dina Ebimbe appears poised for exit
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt officially confirmed the signing of French striker Elye Wahi on Friday. In other SGE-related transfer news, RMC sport reports that there may be a French departure from the RheinMain club.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
